lead_paragraph: Most residents evacuated from 22 homes after a sinkhole developed in suburban Detroit should return in a week, officials said Sunday as a former congresswoman took charge on her first day as Macomb County public works commissioner and declared "all hands on deck."

headline.main: Most Residents Evacuated by Sinkhole Could Return in a Week
